net.minecraftforge.network.simple.handler
 
  • Classes in net.minecraftforge.network.simple.handler used by net.minecraftforge.network
    Class
    Description
    SimpleHandlerProtocol
    Entry point for a SimpleChannel protocol that mimics vanilla's Packet system where every packet must implement SimplePacket and will have their handle(CTX, Context) method called.
    SimplePacket
    Interface that all packets must implement if using the SimpleChannel.protocol(AttributeKey, NetworkProtocol) function.
